content: I am a 3rd year PhD student working on the simulation of the cavitation phenomenon within spacecraft turbopumps.
summary: I am a 3rd year PhD student working on the simulation of the cavitation phenomenon within spacecraft turbopumps.
title: Joris Cazé

summary: Cavitation within spacecraft turbopumps is studied using diffuse-interface multiphase model for which blades rotation is taken into account by use of the Moving Reference Frame method.
title: Modeling and simulation of a turbopump flow a multiphase approach

summary: Cavitation within spacecraft turbopumps is studied using diffuse-interface multiphase model for which blades rotation is taken into account by use of the Moving Reference Frame method.
title: Modeling and simulation of a turbopump flow: a multiphase approach
Workshop on Cavitation, bubble collapse and mass transfer

summary: A new pressure-relaxation is proposed to circumvent wave propagation issues of diffuse-interface methods in the context of multiphase compressible flows.
title: Modelling interactions between waves and diffused interfaces
